main event: A witness observed an unidentified object in the sky in Nampula, Mozambique.
interesting points: The object had an indefinite, changing form, like a cloud.
The object appeared to approach and move away, as well as ascend and descend.
The object displayed pulsing or flickering effects, causing it to appear and disappear.
Three witnesses observed the object, including a newspaper reporter and a local artist.
The artist was able to sketch the object from their close-up observation.
sighted object: an unidentified, cloud-like object in the sky
witnesses: a newspaper reporter and a local artist
photographs: yes, the report includes a sketch by the artist
